```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(redist, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
map <- readRDS("data-out/<!--analysis_name-->/<!--state-->_cd_<!--year-->_map.rds")
plans <- readRDS("data-out/<!--analysis_name-->/<!--state-->_cd_<!--year-->_plans.rds")
plans <- plans %>%
    mutate(dvs = group_frac(map, ndv, ndv + nrv))
```




```{r}
redist::redist.plot.plans(plans, sample(1:5000, 3), geom = map)
```


## Expected Partisanship

```{r}
redist.plot.distr_qtys(plans, dvs, color_thresh = 0.5)
```

## Partisan Bias

```{r}
redist.plot.hist(plans, pbias)
```


## Compactness

```{r}
redist.plot.distr_qtys(plans, polsby_popper)
```
